channel.title: Scale2014 on purpleidea.com
channel.description: Recent content in Scale2014 on purpleidea.com

item.title: Speaking at SCALE today!
item.description: I’ll be giving a talk at SCALE today about automatically deploying GlusterFS with Puppet-Gluster and Vagrant. I’ll be giving some live demos, and this will cover some of the material from: Automatically deploying GlusterFS with Puppet-Gluster + Vagrant! and it will contain excerpts from: Screencasts of Puppet-Gluster + Vagrant I’ll also be talking about some new upcoming features, and am happy to answer all of your questions! The talk will be part of Infrastructure.
